Wearing a mask made of cloths is fine but at the same time remember it wont filter the virus particles as it is much smaller than the bacterias. And it only gives false sense of security. I agree wearing some thing is better than nothing but keep in mind wearing mask dosent replace the practice of keeping at least one meter of distance, washing hands with splosp(at least for 20min)/ 60%alcohol hand rub (always check the percentage when you buy). The only current recommend indication to wear mask at this stage is if you have any cough , to prevent the others to get the virus from you.

I agree social distance too is important. We must carry it. What I mentioned here is an important additional precaution. According to Russian scientists the size of the virus is around 110 nanometre (1/10^6 x 110) which stays with a cluster of saliva etc but not alone. Further, several studies show that people with mild or no symptoms at all could spread covid-19. A research on Diamond Princess Cruise Liner Case is one of them. So, this precaution is still worthy than nothing.
It is around 110 nanometre (1mm/10^6 x 110)

May he rest in peace. üôè Let's hope that we'll overcome this as soon as possible for the sake of our children.  In my hospital our staff is under severe stress and even the patients are more difficult to control. Tempers are bound to run high and we look at each others with supcious eyes, lot of uncertainty is going around which is naturally coz we all are human. These dark days tend to bring the worst side of even the best of us. But in my service i have seen lot of good in our citizens too. So please, PLEASE if you have a contact history please inform the medical team we will always appreciate your honesty and our first priority is to treat you no matter what. It's OK to be afraid , its human nature. But its INHUMAN to put others at risk knowing you carry this virus.  Just see the consequences the communiy facing because of few dishonest irresponsible people. Many cities are on lock down. There are many children are starving even as we speak, their education is on hold, nutition is at stake, elderly cant get thier medication, locked down related social issues such as rise in domestic violance, drug addicts who are on rampage due to withdrawal and so much more social issues as ramifiactions. Be cautious on your expenditure as we may go into financial crisis, global production of consumables are on hold so we may face shortage of supplies so use your food wisely and dont waste. We will ovecome this but it may take a while to go back to where we were. So please do not prolong this lockdown by being restless and going out irresponsibly. As a doctor i beg of you people to take care of you and your loved ones by stayn home. I still have faith in our community so be safe be responsible. We cant take back previous action of others but WE CAN CONTROL THIS FROM GOING OUT OF CONTOL. Its not just up to the government or focres or the health care workers any more . IT'S TIME FOR YOU THE COMMON PEOPLE, SRILLANKAN CITTIZENS TO RISE UP TO SAVE THE COUNTRY. STAY SAFE. MAY TRIPLES GEMS BLESS YOU AND YOUR LITTLE ONES.
